data.title: Funeral Records from Wise County TX (1914
data.meta_description: Listing of funeral home records with links to images of records over 25 years old.
data.text:
Wise County Funeral Home Records

Last Names That Start With

A - C

Click on the Link at the end of the line to see An Image of that record.

If the index below has "CL" for book name, there is NO link to a page. Go to the 'Coker Ledger' button above for all information.

You may want to use "find on this page" to find the maiden names that we DID try to include in this index.
